name: Truant Devourer
languages: Common + up to three other languages

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Devourer's Cleaver or Necrotic Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with Life Drain attack.

actions.name: Devourer's Cleaver
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage + 9 (2d8) necrotic.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 17 (3d8+4) necrotic. Target's hp max is reduced by amount equal to damage taken (DC 16 Con negates hp max). Reduction lasts until target finishes a long rest. Target dies if this reduces its hp max to 0.

actions.name: Necrotic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 17 (3d8+4) necrotic.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: Magically turns invisible (with items worn/carried) until it attacks uses Grasping Claws or concentration ends (as a spell).

actions.name: Grasping Claws (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Calls dozens of ghostly skeletal claws to erupt from a point on the ground it can see within 60' of it. All within 15 ft. of that point: 31 (7d8) necrotic and restrained 1 min (DC 16 Dex half damage not restrained). Restrained creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

bonus_actions.name: Dusty Step
bonus_actions.desc: Teleports  with items worn/carried up to 60' to unoccupied space it can see. Dust cloud appears at origin and destination.

special_abilities.name: Heretic Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint location of heretics of its faith within 60' of it and can sense their general direction within 1 mile of it.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: saves vs. turn undead effects.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.
